info.lead: List of 5 MPs who most often vote differently than the selected MP. MPs are ranked in a descending order. The higher the value, the lower the commonalities between the two MPs.
text: We calculate {link} between the results of the MP's voting and everyone else's voting (values of votes are converted to numerical values between -1 and 1).
When we calculate the "distance" between all the MPs we rank them according to their result and show the last (i.e. furthest removed) five.
